verses.roman:
prabhu dekhi' sārvabhauma dharilā caraṇe
prabhu tāṅre āliṅgiyā vasilā āsane

synonyms: prabhu dekhi'-seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; dharilā caraṇe—caught hold of His feet; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—him; āliṅgiyā—embracing; vasilā āsane—sat down on the seat.
translation: Upon seeing the Lord, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya immediately caught hold of His lotus feet. The Lord also embraced him and sat down.
